the exercise web layout

Simple responsive web layout made as exercise during

JAVA SCRIPT REACT DEVELOPER

course.

read more

about project

what did i got to start with?

  • readme file with description of layout and some tips and clues,
  • graphic files pictures how desktop version of layout should look,
  • some scss files to start with: "_variables.css" that contains colors of main gradient & "normalize.scss" with some predefined settings,
  • all graphic files used in layout

what tools did i use?

  • HTML 5,
  • SCSS including:
    • variables,
    • @mixin / @include,
    • nested selectors,
    • imported partials,
  • Java Script including:
    • HTML DOM objects accessing from JS level,
    • creating and changing HTML objects,
    • adding Event Listeners and events handling.
  • @media querries breakpoints.

What I want to achive?

  • clear & user friendly layout,
  • interactive and responsive,
  • easy modifiable,

...So, here it is:

the middle of the page.

In this place I would use the some Lorem ipsum... stuff.
I suppose it's a perfect place to put short claim, motto or firm philosophy - anything to tell the world, that this page belongs to the best company in bussiness.

About me

Bio

  • Born: 1978,
  • Schools & courses:
    • VIII. L.O. Katowice,
    • Philosophy - Silesian University,
    • Coders Lab Java Script React Developer Course
  • Job experience:
    • KROPA (children's theater) - actor, playwriter & director,
    • ZNAK (publishing office) - author,
    • NEWSWEEK POLAND - published article,
    • ŚLĄSK (literary monthly) - series of short stories.

Programming skills

  • HTML 5
  • CSS 4
  • SCSS
  • JavaScript (ECMA Script 8)
  • REACT (incl. React-Redux & Redux-Thunx)

Other activities

  • HARD ROCKETS - blues/hard rock band - guitarist, singer, songwriter,
  • "SKRZYDLATA HUSARIA" ("Winged Hussars") - book about polish bomber aircrew,
  • "DAMBUSTERS - misja, bez której nie było by Gwiezdnych Wojen" ("DAMBUSTER - mission that inspired Star Wars") - book about RAF Bomber Command attack on Ruhr dams and its impact on history and culture.

Passions

  • Music - listening to and performing as well.
    Everything from Bob Dylan to Jack White, from Robert Johnson to Nick Cave and from Tom Waits to Led Zeppelin.
  • Books - specially vintage SF books,
  • Aviation history - with emphasis on its "romantic" period, when man struggles to master the skies.
